name: Time Step (Living In Code)
description:
YOU control time? Are you worthy of this power?

This game was made for the Brackey's Game Jam, and the theme was REWIND. I came up with the idea of changing the environment as time changes. This was actually from a Minecraft video I watched a while ago, and I had been thinking "How can I use this?". Well, here it is! I also am working on a "Making of" video for this game, and you can expect to see it soon. (By the way the game has no way to quit... you will have to alt+f4)

CONTROLS

Movement - WASD / Arrow Keys

Step Time - Q

Restart Level - R
